description: This file provides services for handling restaurant and delivery ratings, including listing reviews, submitting reviews, and computing rating summaries, with localStorage persistence.

methods.name: listRestaurantReviews
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of reviews for a specific restaurant, sorted by creation date descending.

methods.name: listDeliveryReviews
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of reviews for a specific delivery person, sorted by creation date descending.

methods.name: getRestaurantRatingSummary
methods.description: Calculates and returns a summary of ratings for a specific restaurant.

methods.name: getDeliveryRatingSummary
methods.description: Calculates and returns a summary of ratings for a specific delivery person.

methods.name: submitRestaurantReview
methods.description: Submits a new review for a restaurant, performs validation, updates cache, and returns the review and updated summary.

methods.name: submitDeliveryReview
methods.description: Submits a new review for a delivery person, performs validation, updates cache, and returns the review and updated summary.
